api.name: collection
api.title: MoMo Collection API
api.description: HTTP Service for accessing MTN's MoMo Collection API.

collection.name: collection
collection.description: collection hosts MTN's MoMo Collection Services.

show.name: show
show.description: Get the balance of the account

example.Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key: Corrupti cumque et doloremque quos nisi ipsum.

Authorization.description: Authorization header used for Basic authentication

X-Callback-Url.description: URL to the server where the callback should be sent.
X-Callback-Url.example: Sunt qui culpa autem quis praesentium.

X-Reference-Id.description: Resource ID of the created request to pay transaction.
X-Reference-Id.example: Aspernatur illum et laudantium distinctio architecto.

X-Target-Environment.example: Temporibus quia et debitis maiores iure.

example.Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key: Sed omnis nihil mollitia corrupti sunt vitae.

example.X-Target-Environment: Omnis repellendus deleniti ut aperiam eveniet.

referenceId.description: UUID of transaction to get result
